base_description: Medium-sized, silver blades, white handle scissors.
part_description: Two metal blades, one pivot point, white plastic handles. Blades are sharp and straight, handles are oval-shaped with finger holes, positioned at opposite ends.
internal_interaction_description: The blades intersect at the pivot point, allowing them to open and close smoothly. The handles provide leverage, enabling the user to apply pressure for cutting. The pivot ensures precise alignment of the blades, facilitating efficient cutting action.
external_interaction_description: Scissors interact with materials like paper, fabric, and plastic by cutting through them. Users hold the handles and apply pressure to operate the blades. The tool is portable and commonly used in offices, schools, and homes for crafting, sewing, and general cutting tasks.
